content.raw: Sorry for not remembering, but what is the Converter bug that this fixes? I tried compiling just the changes to Converter_TEST.cc, and the test still pass on my mac without the changes to Converter.cc. So I'm not sure the new tests fully demonstrate the bug.
content.html: Sorry for not remembering, but what is the Converter bug that this fixes? I tried compiling just the changes to Converter_TEST.cc, and the test still pass on my mac without the changes to Converter.cc. So I'm not sure the new tests fully demonstrate the bug.
